scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Christ, scourged and bleeding, standing with a crown of thorns on his head. He holds a spear in his left hand and places his right hand over a wound on his chest. Around him are instruments of his Passion: a ladder, a scourge, a pair of tongs, and a lance. The background is a rich gold, suggesting a divine or spiritual setting. The figure of Christ is rendered with pale, wounded flesh, emphasizing his suffering.
